title: Good Puppy, Naughty Puppy, Sad Puppy, Happy Puppy
description: A heartwarming story about a little boy and his dog. Tommy receives a puppy for his birthday. They are inseparable until one day his puppy gets lost. How does Tommy react? What does he do to find his puppy? Whom does he meet along the way? Does he ever find the puppy? The story is written in an easy to read rhyming format and includes strategically placed ‘Can You Guess’ questions that invite a young child to interact with the story. The full color digitally rendered illustrations are bold and vibrant, adorable and delightful.
author: Florence D. Blanding
